entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets in the morning then to rain near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Fog patches developing near noon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers in the evening then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
